func_sig.description: Calculate the volume and surface area of a frustum given the top and bottom radii and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_frustum

radius_bottom.description: The radius of the bottom base.

radius_top.description: The radius of the top base.

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of various shapes based on given parameters.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_shape

parameters.description: Parameters needed for the specified shape.

shape_type.description: The type of shape (circle, triangle, trapezoid).

func_sig.description: Calculate the areas and volumes of cones and frustums based on given parameters.
func_sig.name: calculate_areas_and_volumes

cone_radius.description: The radius of the cone base.

frustum_radius.description: The radius of the frustum base.

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given the lengths of its sides using Heron's formula.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_triangle

semiperimeter.description: Calculate semi perimeter, which is (a + b + c) / 2.

func_sig.description: Calculate the ratio of a smaller value to a larger value.
func_sig.name: calculate_ratio

func_sig.description: Calculate the ratio of two areas and their corresponding volumes for similar geometries.
func_sig.name: calculate_ratio_of_areas
